p: The most persuasive benzotriazole helicase inhibitors were recognized throughout the duration of random screening study [ 58, 59]. In particular, 4, 5, 6, 7- tetrabromobenzotriazole (TBBT) acknowledged as a powerful and exceedingly discriminating inhibitor of protein kinase 2, which displayed inhibitory concentration (IC 50) values of 20 μM and 5,6-dichloro-1-( β-D-ribofuranosyl) benzotriazole (DRBT) demonstrated IC 50 values of 1.5 μM.
